scripts.purge: purgecss --css assets/css/style.css --content ./**/*.php ./source/**/*.js ./assets/**/*.js --output assets/css/style.purged.css && purgecss --css assets/css/layout.css --content ./**/*.php ./source/**/*.js ./assets/**/*.js --output assets/css/layout.purged.css && purgecss --css assets/css/responsive.css --content ./**/*.php ./source/**/*.js ./assets/**/*.js --output assets/css/responsive.purged.css && purgecss --css assets/css/theme-vendors.min.css --content ./**/*.php ./source/**/*.js ./assets/**/*.js --output assets/css/theme-vendors.purged.css --safelist wp-.* admin-.* post-.* page-.* custom-.* is-.* has-.* align.* theme-.* search-.* screen-.* widget.* nav-.* menu-.* elementor-.* slick-.* owl-.*
